greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, where T(n,k) is the coefficient of x^n*y^k in f(x,y) that satisfies f(x,y) = 1/(1-x)^2 + xy*f(x,y)^2.
formula: T(n,k) = binomial(2*k, k-1)*binomial(n+k+1, n-k) / k for k > 0. # _Peter Luschny_, Jan 26 2018
maple: for n from 0 to 8 do seq(T(n,k), k=0..n) od; # _Peter Luschny_, Jan 26 2018
xref: Cf. A086615 (antidiagonal sums), A086616 (row sums), A086617.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jul 24 2003
